sQuestion: You need to choose between 2 telephone plans for local calls. Plan A charges 25 dollars per month for unlimited calls. Plan B charges a monthly fee of 13 dollars with a charge of 0.06 dollars per local call. How many local telephone calls in a month make Plan A the better deal?

sentences.sentence: You need to choose between 2 telephone plans for local calls.
Plan A charges 25 dollars per month for unlimited calls.
Plan B charges a monthly fee of 13 dollars with a charge of 0.06 dollars per local call.
How many local telephone calls in a month make Plan A the better deal?
